## ResourceTypes.ResourceType.validateDeclaration() method

Validates a [resource candidate declaration](./ts-res.resourcejson.json.ilooseresourcecandidatedecl.md) for a resource instance value.

**Signature:**

```typescript
abstract validateDeclaration(json: JsonValue, isPartial: boolean, mergeMethod?: ResourceValueMergeMethod): Result<T | Partial<T>>;
```

</td><td>

</td></tr>

**Returns:**

Result&lt;T \| Partial&lt;T&gt;&gt;

`Success` with the strongly-typed resource value if the JSON and merge method are valid, `Failure` with an error message otherwise.
